trends: There have been no other sightings in Bordentown Township
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: circular object stationary in night sky, went through series of bright purple, red, blue lights then descended into nothing
divs: sighting detailswhile walking my dog in bordentown new jersey at 9:33 pm sept. 27, 2013, i witnessed a circular object in the night sky sitting stationary about 1\2 mile beyond the horizon. bright purple lights were seen all around the object then red, blue, back to purple. this went on for about two minutes then all of a sudden it went completely dark descending to the ground. i noticed several airplanes above and beyond this object in the night star lit sky. i could not believe what i was seeing and the extent of vibrant colors this object emitted was extraordinary.
